title: RADS Error (Pls send help) SOS
body:
It's been 3 days and I've still not been able to even launch league due to a error that hates me , im not sure what the cause is but i have been playing league before it occurred , I haven't change my firewall settings and since im able to post this im assuming my internet connection is fine D: 
Please help 
I've tried re installing
I've tried changing the DNS to googles 8.8.8.8 / 8.8.4.4
I've tried replacing the rads_user_kernel file 

http://puu.sh/mT1ZN/e6faed7fd8.png
 nothing seems to work and i wanna play league D:  {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Can you try the solutions in the Troubleshooting Connection Issues Riot Games Support article:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Hope this helps!
I just finished trying everything , including disabling my firewalls and running and it still comes up with that exact popup as above , D: what do i do?{{item:3070}}
